with two or more things combined in order to become more effective: be integrated with The town's modern architecture is very well integrated with the old. This model offers an opportunity for a more integrated approach to health care.
consisting of different groups of people who mix, live, or work well together: The community has become more integrated over the years. a racially integrated school system See
